citation: Public Sector Superannuation Reform (Declaration of Commission) Notice 2020 (Tas)
text:
Public Sector Superannuation Reform (Declaration of Commission) Notice 2020

I make the following notice under section 6(5) of the Public Sector Superannuation Reform Act 2016 .

19 October 2020

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Finance

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Public Sector Superannuation Reform (Declaration of Commission) Notice 2020 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
        (1) In this notice â€“
            Act means the Public Sector Superannuation Reform Act 2016 .
        (2) The Acts Interpretation Act 1931 applies to the interpretation of this notice as if this notice were by-laws.

4. Commission to be corporation sole
    Under section 6(5) of the Act, the Commission is declared to be a corporation sole.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 October 2020

This notice is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
